EqnSelector.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*  
00002  * File: EqnSelector.h 
00003  * ------------------- 
00004  * Created      03/30/00        Huic 
00005  * Header file for Equation Selector class, which 
00006  *
00007  *  1) switch full set of variables
00008  *  2) reduce full set to primary set
00009  *  3) reduce implicit level of the primary set
00010  * 
00011  *  4) calculate explicit variable change
00012  *  5) calculate secondary variable change
00013  * 
00014  * ------------------------------------------  
00015  * Modified by HPan, Feb. 2006:
00016  * Separate connection implementation into EqnSelectorConnImp class 
00017  *
00018  * All data are created in this class and its inheritance classes
00019  *
00020  * EqnSelectorConnImp class and its inheritance classes share these data:
00021  *        copy value for value-type data
00022  *    copy address for pointer type data (shared) 
00023  * 
00024  */  
00025 
00026 #ifndef EQNSELECTOR_H_ 
00027 #define EQNSELECTOR_H_ 
00028 #include "../utl/DataPool.h"
00029  
00030 #include "../facilities/Facilities.h" 
00031 #include "EqnSelectorConnImp.h" 
00032 
00033 class EqnSelector { 
00034  public: 
00035         EqnSelector(DataPool *dataPool, const Facilities *pFac); 
00036         virtual ~EqnSelector(); 
00037 
00038         virtual void registerData();    // register data from datapool
00039         virtual void linearize();               // do 1), 2) and 3) to get the Jacobian matrix
00040         virtual bool newtonUpdate();    // do 4) and 5) 
00041         
00042         //define the friend class
00043         friend class EqnSelectorConnImp;
00044         friend class EqnSelector2PConnImp;
00045         friend class EqnSelectorMPConnImp;
00046   
00047  protected:
00048         int nCells, nConns, nWells;
00049         int nPhases, nComps, nHCPhases, nHCComps, nVars;
00050         bool mBlackOil;                                 // black-oil?
00051   int mThermal;
00052 
00053 
00054         int nPri, nSec;                                 // number of primary and secondary variables
00055         const int *nImpVars;                    // number of implicit variables for each block
00056         const int *mCellStatus;                 // cell status (any HC phase disappeared?)
00057 
00058         DataPool *mDataPool;                    // pointer to datapool
00059         const Facilities *pFacilities;
00060 
00061         double *mDiag, *mOffD_A, *mOffD_B;              // Reservoir Jacobian (diag and offdiags)
00062         double *mRHS;                                                   // Mass balance equation RHS                                                                                                                    
00063         double *mFlash_JAC, *mFlash_RHS;                // flash Jacobian and RHS
00064 
00065 
00066         double *mTmp;           // temporary work space
00067         int *mIpiv;                     // temporary work space
00068 
00069         EqnSelectorConnImp* mEqnConnImp;
00070 
00071 
00072         // --- methods used in linearize ------------
00073         virtual void combineResAndWells();      // incorporate wells' RRJ into the diag of reservoir Jac
00074         virtual void switchFullSetVars();       // switch the full set of variables
00075         virtual void reduceToPrimarySet();      // reduce full set to primary set (FIM)
00076         virtual void reduceImplicitLevel();     // reduce the implicit level of the primary set
00077         virtual void removeRWJ();                       // remove the WRJ (single block rate control well)
00078 
00079         // --- back substitute to update explicit variables ----
00080         virtual void updateExpVars();   // update the explicit primary variables        
00081         virtual void updateSecVars();   // update the secondary variables       
00082         virtual void updateBaseVars();  // update the base variables if necessary
00083         virtual void updateWellVars();  // update the well BHP (single block rate control well) 
00084 
00085 
00086         // --- rearrange matrix A for single HC phase blocks ---
00087         void ReArrangeA(bool onlyGas, double *A, const double *B, int nEqn); 
00088 
00089         void ConstrainElim(int Status, double *A, double *B, double *Fp, double *Fs, int);
00090 };
00091  
00092 #endif
